extendedInfo.description: Allows real time attendee Check-In at the venue. On the spot syncing of Check-In data allows parallel attendee Check-In using multiple Android phones.Supports both QR code scanning and manual attendee Check-In.Visit http://www.eventbee.com to power your event with Eventbee ticketing, $1 FLAT fee per ticket sale!

reviews.title: CRASHES
reviews.comment: This app crashes all the time. Is a bit annoying especially when utilizing at an event. Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Wana Williams

reviews.title: Does not work with eventbee QR codes!
reviews.comment: Does not work with the eventbee QR codes... the name comes up \"null null\" and does not check in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor Support, Force Closes, No Manual Check-in
reviews.comment: This developer has poor support. Had multiple problems with this app both on the Android and iPhone side. Scans would work, when the app wasn\'t crashing and Force Closing. Scan ID\'s were only useful for scanning tickets. Manual check-ins never worked for any of my events. The only way I could get it fully functional was to give out my Eventbee ID and password to an iPhone user. Thanks a lot Eventbee. Great concept, but horrible support. IF you decide to use them, make sure you start with a test event
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: TERRIBLE
reviews.comment: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE app. Eventbee sucks. MANY better options like TicketLeap, Eventbrite, Vendini, Brown Paper Tix, AttendStar, etc. Eventbee will nickel and dime you. They claim free for free events & tickets but this is not true. $1 flat fee is for very basic and limited features and they raise the price to unlock features every event manager would need to utilize. Again, ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE. STAY AWAY FROM EVENTBEE!
reviews.author: A Google User
